Title: Using TCPView tool to monitor an ODX instance _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: TCPView is a Sysinternals troubleshooting tool to view TCP and UDP endpoints on your system, including the local and remote addresses and state of TCP connections.This may help troubleshoot a TimeXtender ODX instance which uses TCP communications. TCPView To filter on a specific port, enter the port # in the search box. Below is an example forODX:
